name: QR-assign2
query:
SELECT 
    `tabQuotation`.customer_name as "Customer:Data:120",
    `tabQuotation`.company as "Company:Link/Company:100",
    `tabQuotation`.docstatus as "Docstatus:100",
    `tabQuotation`.transaction_date as "Date:Date:100",
    `tabQuotation Item`.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:100",
    `tabQuotation Item`.qty as "Qty:Float:100",
    `tabQuotation Item`.rate as "IRate :Currency/currency:100",
    `tabQuotation`.grand_total as "Grand Total:Currency:100"

FROM `tabQuotation` JOIN `tabQuotation Item`
WHERE
    `tabQuotation Item`.qty >= %(qty)s and 
    `tabQuotation`.grand_total>10000 and 
    `tabQuotation`.transaction_date >= %(from_date)s and
    `tabQuotation`.transaction_date <= %(to_date)s
